name: God Fighter
description:
God Fighter

Fight the gods of ancient Egypt to restore balance in one-on-one fights and climb to the top

Game controls Player one:
  • A to move left
  • D to move right
  • Space or W to jump
  • 1 to attack (non-numpad)
Player two:
  • (Left analogue stick) Left analogue/D-pad to move left
  • (Left analogue stick) Right analogue/D-pad to move right
  • Y to jump
  • A to Attack
